description.value: Action plugin to create a new issue in JIRA

property.label: JIRA URL
property.description: The JIRA URL for creating a new issue

property.label: JIRA Project ID
property.description: The ID (not the name) of the JIRA project for the new issue

property.label: JIRA Issue Type ID
property.description: The ID (not the name) of the JIRA issue type for the new issue

property.label: JIRA Component ID
property.description: The ID (not the name) of the JIRA component for the new issue

property.label: JIRA Priority
property.description: The priority for the new issue

property.label: JIRA Reporter
property.description: The reporter for the new issue

property.label: JIRA Assignee
property.description: The assignee for the new issue (will be defaulted to the reporter if missing)

property.label: JIRA Version
property.description: The version for the new issue
